full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO HANGK'A RGYAL PO 'KHOR BCAS KYI GSOL MCHOD DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG DPAG BSAM 'KHRI SHING ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B (ZHES PA 'DI YANG CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO DGRA LHA HANGK'A RGYAL PO 'KHOR BCAS LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL BA'I RIM PA DGOS 'DOD 'BYUNG BA'I MNA' BRAG DPAG BSAM 'KHRI SHING ZHES BYA BA, 'DI NI GU RU SA M'A H'A NA RJE BTZUN RNAL 'BYOR MA DE NYID KYI 'KHOR MTHA' GTAN NAS DBEN PA'I BKA' DRIN CHE LCE BA'I DRIN GYIS KHO BO CAG GI GZIGS SNANG LA SNGA MO NAS CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO 'KHOR BCAS KYIS, ,YANG YANG DU GSAL LE BAR 'BYUNG STE THUB BSTAN RIN PO CHE DANG, KHYAD PAR KHYOD KYI BSTAN PA'I BSRUNG MA NGER TSO NGES PA RANG YIN ZHES BKA' SPYI BOR 'BEBS PA DANG, BLA MA RJE BTZUN MAS KHYOD KYIS DE NYID KYI GSOL MCHOD KYI RIM PA @013A *, ,RNAMS 'DI BZHIN DU BRIS SHIG CES BKA' BZLOG TU MED PA YANG DAG PAR PHAB PA LA BRTEN NAS, ,RIG 'DZIN TE DZVA BADZVAS YIG RNYING GANG LA'ANG MA LTOS PAR RANG RKANG 'DZUGS TE RANG BZOS MA BSLAD PAR RJE BTZUN MA'I DRIN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
